actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution to amend rule XXV of the Rules of the Senate.

summary.text: Entitles the Minority party on any standing committee and subcommittee thereof, upon request of a majority of such minority, to not less than one-third of the funds provided for the appointment of committee staff pursuant to each primary or additional expense resolution. Provides that the committee shall appoint any persons so selected whose character and qualifications are acceptable to a majority of the committee.

titles.title: A resolution to amend rule XXV of the Rules of the Senate.
